ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that they said that pets take 2 percent of a group s experience, which is more than made up for by the presence of the pet.  But I think this was a
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that they said that pets take "2 percent" of a group's experience, which is more than made up
for by the presence of the pet. But I think this was a seat-of-the-pants guesstimate as to how often a
pet would do a majority of the damage (and hence take half the exp). I think they still get half the exp
if they do a majority of the damage.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 58 songs, Innoruuk



Christopher Sanders wrote:

> I was under the impression that this changed along with the major experience
> changes a couple months back?
>
> Could be wrong, but I really do remember a quote as saying pets take no exp,
> with no qualifications given.
>
> Atonal
